src:
Usai Lawan Kanker, Kim Woo-bin Segera Kembali Main Film
07 Nov 2019, 13:09 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Aktor Kim Woo-bin akan segera kembali ke layar lebar setelah beberapa tahun terakhir bertarung melawan kanker. (AFP PHOTO / Starnews)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- AktorÂ Kim Woo-bin akan segera kembali ke layar lebar setelah beberapa tahun terakhir bertarung melawan kanker.Melansir Allkpop, Kim Woo-bin dikabarkan sudah jauh lebih membaik dan akan menjadi pemeran utama dalam film terbarunya bersama aktor Ryu Jun-yeol dan Kim Tae-ri.Proyek tersebut akan menjadi film pertama aktor kelahiran 1989 tersebut dalam tiga tahun terakhir.Kim Woo-bin terakhir kali bermain film Master (2016) dan menjadi salah satu pemeran utama dalam Twenty (2015) bersama Lee Jun-ho dan Kang Ha-neul. Sementara itu, Uncontrollably Fond (2016) menjadi drama terakhir yang ia bintangi dalam beberapa tahun terakhir.Usai bermain dalam Uncontrollably Fond, Kim Woo-bin terpaksa rehat untuk pemulihan setelah didiagnosa mengidap kanker nasofaring pada 2017. Kanker nasofaring merupakan jenis kanker yang tumbuh di rongga belakang hidung dan belakang langit-langit rongga mulut.SidusHQ selaku agensi mengonfirmasi artisnya tidak dalam kondisi parah dan langsung menerima terapi radiasi dan pengobatan. Pada awal 2019, SidusHQ memberi tahu bahwa kondisi Kim Woo-bin telah jauh lebih baik dan bisa menyapa penggemar melalui proyek film baru.Kala itu, salah satu yang masuk pertimbangan adalah film kejahatan berlatar belakang sejarah karya Sutradara Choi Dong-hoon yang sebelumnya dikenal melalui film The Thieves (2012) dan Assassination (2015).Sebelumnya, Kim Woo-bin juga bekerja sama dengan Sutradara Choi Dong-hoon dalam film Wiretap (2018). Namun, produksi film tersebut akhirnya dihentikan setelah Kim Woo-bin didiagnosa kanker nasofaring. (chri/end)
text:
After Fighting Cancer, Kim Woo-bin Soon Returns to Play Movies
Nov 7 2019, 13:09 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Actor Kim Woo-bin will soon return to the big screen after the last few years battling cancer. (AFP PHOTO / Starnews)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Actor Kim Woo-bin will soon return to the big screen after the last few years fighting against cancer. Launching Allkpop, Kim Woo-bin is reported to have been much better and will be the main actor in his latest film with actor Ryu Jun- yeol and Kim Tae-ri. The project will be the actor's first film born in 1989 in the last three years. Kim Woo-bin last played the film Master (2016) and became one of the main actors in Twenty (2015) with Lee Jun-ho and Kang Ha-neul. Meanwhile, Uncontrollably Fond (2016) became the last drama he starred in in recent years. After playing Uncontrollably Fond, Kim Woo-bin was forced to take a break for recovery after being diagnosed with nasopharyngeal cancer in 2017. Nasopharyngeal cancer is a type of cancer that grows in the cavity. back of the nose and back of the mouth cavity. SIDUSHQ as the agency confirmed the artist was not in a severe condition and immediately received radiation therapy and treatment. In early 2019, SidusHQ informed that Kim Woo-bin's condition was much better and could greet fans through a new film project. At that time, one that was considered was a crime film with a historical background by Director Choi Dong-hoon that was previously known through the film The Thieves (2012) and Assassination (2015). Previously, Kim Woo-bin also collaborated with Director Choi Dong-hoon in the film Wiretap (2018). However, the film's production was finally stopped after Kim Woo-bin was diagnosed with nasopharyngeal cancer. (chri / end)
